spec_data.Name: perl-Plack-Middleware-ReverseProxy
spec_data.Description:
Plack::Middleware::ReverseProxy resets some HTTP headers, which changed by
reverse-proxy. You can specify the reverse proxy address and stop fake
requests using 'enable_if' directive in your app.psgi.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:15:58 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Supports app to run as a reverse proxy back-end
